<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_58872_needit.NeedItWhenNeededCheckTodayUtils</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>NeedItWhenNeededCheckTodayUtils</name><script><![CDATA[var NeedItWhenNeededCheckTodayUtils = Class.create();
NeedItWhenNeededCheckTodayUtils.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },
	
isDateToday: function(strDate){
	var rightnow = new GlideDate();
	var testdate = new GlideDate(strDate.getDate());
	
	if(rightnow == testdate){
		return true;
	}
	else {
		return false;
	}
},
    type: 'NeedItWhenNeededCheckTodayUtils'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-04-25 21:41:44</sys_created_on><sys_id>07b54074db7f20104d0c84d86896199b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>NeedItWhenNeededCheckTodayUtils</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_07b54074db7f20104d0c84d86896199b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-04-25 21:41:44</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
